title: Ankle-Length Olive Linen Maxi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of an ankle-length maxi dress in olive linen, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, soft drape, slight A-line silhouette, short puff sleeves, square neckline, concealed side zipper, lightweight linen fabric
techpack: Ankle-length A-line maxi dress with short puff sleeves, square neckline, concealed side zipper on left seam, self-fabric waist tie, topstitching detail at neckline and hem, lightweight linen shell with cotton blend lining, finished hem length 58 inches from shoulder.
provenance: Inspired by the commercial ankle-length trend for versatile day-to-evening wear, updated with linen fabric and modern puff sleeve silhouette.
design_text: Ankle-Length Olive Linen Maxi Dress (ALD001) Colors: olive green Fabrics: linen, cotton blend lining Prints: solid color Garment: dress Silhouette: A-line Sleeves: short puff sleeves Neckline: square neck Length: ankle-length Style/Fit: relaxed fit through body, gently fitted at waist Trims: concealed side zipper, narrow self-fabric waist tie, topstitching along neckline and hem
